characters.name: MEDEA
characters.description: Princess of Colchis, sorceress, wife of Jason and mother of their children. Intelligent, proud, and passionate; unjustly treated by the man she loves.

characters.name: JASON
characters.description: Heroic captain of the Argo, husband of Medea. Charming, confident and ambitious. A loving father but a cheating husband.

characters.name: PHILODIKE
characters.description: A Corinthian noblewoman, and sympathetic and supportive friend to Medea.

characters.name: NURSE
characters.description: A slave and long-serving retainer of Medea, who has a familiar and motherly relationship toward her mistress and the children.

characters.name: TUTOR
characters.description: A slave and tutor to Medea’s children.

characters.name: CREON
characters.description: King of Corinth, Jason’s new father-in-law. A proud and stern ruler.

characters.name: CREUSA
characters.description: Creon’s daughter, Jason’s new bride. Non-speaking part, appearing in a single scene. An unfortunate victim of Jason’s ambition and Medea’s vengeance.

characters.name: AEGEUS
characters.description: King of Athens, a kind and understanding friend of Medea.
